TopicTitle: Strange active part behaviour in flight

Articles.Content:
I have been getting this happened recently:

For some reason, all parts are considered active and all possible animations are played at the same time, without any user input. Look at the RCS. And with all of them like that, the craft simply wrangled itself apart in to pieces, current crafts in orbit spins out of control,etc. Also notice the staging bar where icon of stuff are gone. Kraken attack, for sure. Tried it with a new save as control to ensure it wasn't a corrupted save, but got the same problem.

The thing is, I can't confirm why this happen. My KSP game is heavily modded, but I don't think they are the reason, as this happen intermittently. Sometimes it just happens, sometimes I can fly like normal, with the same mods. However, they seems to increase recently as I try to squeeze the last few mods in.

Possible ram problem? Or something else entirely?

Playing KSP 0.90 32 bit. Mod list too long to list, and I don't think a specific mod is the culprit.

Edit: Ok, I was wrong. Tweakscale was the culprit. Took me quite a while swapping my mods around to realized it caused the problem. Updated it and got it done.
